Summary: Login: Error message in the login form are displayed in English
Steps_to_reprodce: 1.Open site https://www.mysite.org/login; 2.Follow 'Inloggen' link; 3.Fill required fields with invalid data; 4.Click 'Inloggen' button; 5.Pay attention to error messages;
Actual_result: Error messages in the login form are displayed in English
Expected_result: Error messages in the login form are displayed in the chosen language
